quote: Nobody exists on purpose. Nobody belongs anywhere.
author: Morty

quote: We're all going to die. Come watch TV.
author: Morty

quote: Losers look stuff up while the rest of us are carpin' all them diems.
author: Summer

quote: He's not a hot girl. He can't just bail on his life and set up shop in someone else's.
author: Beth

quote: When you are an a—hole, it doesn't matter how right you are. Nobody wants to give you the satisfaction.
author: Morty

quote: God's turning people into insect monsters, Beth. I'm the one beating them to death. Thank me.
author: Jerry

quote: Camping is just being homeless without the change.
author: Summer

quote: This seems like a good time for a drink and a cold, calculated speech with sinister overtones. A speech about politics, about order, brotherhood, power ... but speeches are for campaigning. Now is the time for action.
author: Morty

quote: Having a family doesn't mean that you stop being an individual. You know the best thing you can do for the people that depend on you? Be honest with them, even if it means setting them free.
author: Mr. Meeseeks

quote: If I've learned one thing, it's that before you get anywhere in life, you gotta stop listening to yourself.
author: Jerry

quote: I just want to go back to Hell, where everyone thinks I'm smart and funny.
author: Mr. Needful

quote: Hi Mr. Jellybean, I'm Morty. I’m on an adventure with my grandpa.
author: Morty

quote: You're not the cause of your parents' misery. You're just a symptom of it.
author: Summer

quote: Don't deify the people who leave you.
author: Beth

quote: Well, then get your s—t together, get it all together, and put it in a backpack, all your s—t, so it's together. And if you gotta take it somewhere, take it somewhere, you know, take it to the s—t store and sell it, or put it in the s—t museum. I don't care what you do, you just gotta get it together. Get your s—t together.
author: Morty

quote: At least the devil has a job!
author: Summer

quote: Life is effort and I'll stop when I die!
author: Jerry

quote: I just killed my family! I don't care what they were!
author: Morty

quote: It's funny to say they are small. It's funny to say they are big.
author: Shrimply Pibbles

quote: You're holding me verbally hostage.
author: Summer

quote: Honey, stop raising your father's cholesterol so you can take a hot funeral selfie.
author: Beth

quote: Rick, when you say you made an exact replica of the house, did you mean, like, an exact replica?
author: Morty

quote: Give a gun to the lady who got pregnant with me too early and constantly makes it our problem.
author: Summer

quote: Say goodbye to your precious dry land! For soon it will be wet!
author: Mr. Nimbus

quote: Nobody's smarter than Rick, but nobody else is my dad. You're a genius at that.
author: Morty

quote: B—h, my generation gets traumatized for breakfast.
author: Summer

quote: Inception made sense!
author: Morty

quote: I realize now I'm attracted to you for the same reason I can't be with you: You can't change. And I have no problem with that, but it clearly means I have a problem with myself.
author: Unity

quote: Mr. President, if I've learned one thing today, it's that sometimes you have to not give a f—k!
author: Morty

quote: I didn't know freedom meant people doing stuff that sucks.
author: Summer

quote: How many of these are just horrible mistakes I made? I mean, maybe I'd stop making so many if I let myself learn from them.
author: Morty

quote: I'm a scientist because I invent, transform, create, and destroy for a living. And when I don't like something about the world, I change it.
author: Rick

quote: Wubba lubba dub dub!
author: Rick

quote: I turned myself into a pickle, Morty! I'm Pickle Rick!
author: Rick

quote: I know about the Yosemite T-shirt, Morty.
author: Rick

quote: The universe is basically an animal. It grazes on the ordinary. It creates infinite idiots just to eat them.
author: Rick

quote: If I die in a cage, I lose a bet.
author: Rick

quote: Sometimes science is more art than science.
author: Rick

quote: To live is to risk it all—otherwise, you're just an inert chunk of randomly assembled molecules drifting wherever the universe blows you.
author: Rick

quote: Welcome to the club, pal.
author: Rick

quote: So I have an emo streak. It's part of what makes me so rad.
author: Rick

quote: Listen, I'm not the nicest guy in the universe, because I'm the smartest, and being nice is something stupid people do to hedge their bets.
author: Rick

quote: Wait a minute! Is that Mountain Dew in my quantum-transport-solution?
author: Rick

quote: Listen, Morty, I hate to break it to you, but what people call 'love' is just a chemical reaction that compels animals to breed.
author: Rick

quote: Break the cycle, Morty. Rise above. Focus on science.
author: Rick

quote: Don't get drawn into the culture, Morty. Stealing stuff is about the stuff, not the stealing.
author: Rick

quote: I'm sorry, but your opinion means very little to me.
author: Rick

quote: You don't get to tell anyone what's sad. You’re like a one-man Mount Sadmore. So I guess like a Lincoln Sadmorial.
author: Rick

quote: This pickle doesn't care about your children. I'm not gonna take their dreams. I'm gonna take their parents.
author: Rick

quote: I programmed you to believe that.
author: Rick

quote: Have fun with empowerment. It seems to make everyone that gets it really happy.
author: Rick

quote: Thanks, Mr. Poopybutthole. I always could count on you.
author: Rick

quote: Weddings are basically funerals with a cake.
author: Rick

quote: I mean, if you spend all day shuffling words around, you can make anything sound bad, Morty.
author: Rick

quote: It's your choice to take this personally.
author: Rick

quote: Excuse me, coming through. What are you here for? Just kidding, I don't care.
author: Rick

quote: If I let you make me nervous, then we can't get schwifty.
author: Rick

quote: Oh, boy, so you actually learned something today? What is this, Full House?
author: Rick

quote: I can't abide bureaucracy. I don't like being told where to go and what to do. I consider it a violation. Did you get those seeds all the way up your butt?
author: Rick

quote: I think you have to think ahead and live in the moment.
author: Rick

quote: I know that new situations can be intimidating. You're lookin' around and it's all scary and different, but you know, meeting them head-on, charging into 'em like a bull—that's how we grow as people.
author: Rick
